definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases

sentences.english: He would have gladly exchanged it all for a single word from Nadyezhda.
sentences.chinese: 他願將所有這一切換得娜蒂契達的隻言片語。

sentences.english: She had known nothing of the plan. Diego had never let on.
sentences.chinese: 她對這個計劃一無所知，迭戈從未吐露隻言片語。

sentences.english: Shines with a feel-good, spare text that goes right to the heart of childhood emotions.
sentences.chinese: 用溫馨的隻字片語觸及你內心真實的童年情感。

sentences.english: An intransitive phrasal verb is not followed by an object.
sentences.chinese: 不及物片語動詞沒有直接受詞跟隨著。

sentences.english: I hate to memorize phrases with fixed prepositions from books.
sentences.chinese: 我很痛恨從書本上強記需要配上固定介係詞的片語。

sentences.english: They are usually called Conquering Prepositions or Conquering Phrases and the like.
sentences.chinese: 那些書通常是戰勝介係詞或戰勝片語之類的書名。

sentences.english: I will leave someday , without a world.
sentences.chinese: 某天，我將安靜地離去，沒有支言片語。

sentences.english: How many idioms have we studied in this book so far?
sentences.chinese: 到現在爲止，我們在這本書裏學了多少片語呢？

sentences.english: A preposition together with its object is termed " prepositional phrase".
sentences.chinese: 一個介詞與它其後的受詞一併被稱爲“介詞片語”。

sentences.english: In this way you are more likely to remember the words, phrases and grammatical constructions you meet.
sentences.chinese: 這樣你更可能記得字，片語和文法的建築你適宜的。

sentences.english: In this chapter, you'll find words and phrases about love and relationships.
sentences.chinese: 這一章，你將讀到有關愛情和浪漫關係的字詞和片語。

sentences.english: Don't search that phrase in my whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 不要在我的鬍鬚中搜尋片語。

sentences.english: His meaningful expression and measured silence indicated I should absorb the phrase.
sentences.chinese: 他的意義深長表達和標準的沈默指出我應該吸收片語。

sentences.english: In the appendix of the textbook, all phrases can be found arranged in alphabetical order.
sentences.chinese: 在課本的附錄中，你可以照字母的順序找到所有片語。

sentences.english: Try to learn by heart these english word and phrases .
sentences.chinese: 努力把這些英語單字和片語記住。

definition: (literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
far-flung realms as next door (idiom)/close in spirit although far away
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
